EmailTemplate.subject: Save Money at {!Lead.Company} with Solar Power
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Since I mailed you our school’s video last month I’ve been swamped helping several environmentally-conscious private schools finance solar power installations for no money down.
Now that I’ve come up for air, I want to make sure «Institution» has explored these same opportunities.
With no capital outlay, {!Lead.Company} will be able to save money on day one, lock-in low energy rates, accurately forecast 20 years of operation budgets, and reduce its carbon footprint.
With a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA), we will cover the cost to design, install, operate and maintain , {!Lead.Company}’s solar electric system with no up-front cost. You simply purchase clean renewable solar power at a discounted rate to what you’re currently paying for electricity. There are no risks, because we pay all of the operations and maintenance costs.
For 30 years, Borrego Solar has been working to help schools go solar, and since last 2009, we secured nearly $100 million to finance solar projects for educational institutions.
Here’s a partial list of recent customers:
University of CA San Diego
San Diego Community College District
College of Marin
New Haven Unified School District
Lagunitas School District
Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Marin County Day School
Smith College
Novato Charter School
Hopkinton School District
Laguna Beach School District
College Preparatory School, Oakland
For more information on Borrego’s PPA, and to read case studies for some of our finished projects please visit our website.
Please contact me to schedule a 15 minute phone call to learn more about PPAs and going solar.
jharrison@borregosolar.com or (978) 513-2604
Kind regards,
Joe
